actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition and takes 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The memory web can grapple only one creature at a time.
actions.name: Ensnare

name: Memory Web [QftIS]
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius)

specialTraits.description: While it is grappling a creature, the memory web takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature grappled by the web takes the other half.
specialTraits.name: Damage Transfer

specialTraits.description: If the memory web is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the memory web move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the memory web is animate.
specialTraits.name: False Appearance

specialTraits.description: When the memory web is reduced to 0 hit points, it discharges any memories it consumed over the past 24 hours in a telepathic deluge. Hazy, dreamlike visions of these discharged memories lodge in the minds of creatures up to 120 feet from the memory web.
specialTraits.name: Memory Flood
